javax.swing

Class JTable.SortManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.JTable.SortManager
  • Enclosing class:
    JTable

    private final class JTable.SortManager
extends Object
    SortManager provides support for managing the selection and variable row heights when sorting is enabled. This information is encapsulated into a class to avoid bulking up JTable.

    • Field Summary

      Sets the height for a row at a specified index.
      private void setViewRowHeightsFromModel()
      Resets the variable row heights in terms of the view from that of the variable row heights in terms of the model.
      void viewSelectionChanged(ListSelectionEvent e)
      Invoked when the selection, on the view, has changed.

      • prepareForChange

        public void prepareForChange(RowSorterEvent sortEvent,
                    JTable.ModelChange change)
        Invoked when either the table model has changed, or the RowSorter has changed. This is invoked prior to notifying the sorter of the change.

      • cacheSelection

        private void cacheSelection(RowSorterEvent sortEvent,
                  JTable.ModelChange change)
        Updates the internal cache of the selection based on the change.

      • cacheModelSelection

        private void cacheModelSelection(RowSorterEvent sortEvent)

      • processChange

        public void processChange(RowSorterEvent sortEvent,
                 JTable.ModelChange change,
                 boolean sorterChanged)
        Inovked when either the table has changed or the sorter has changed and after the sorter has been notified. If necessary this will reapply the selection and variable row heights.

      • setViewRowHeightsFromModel

        private void setViewRowHeightsFromModel()
        Resets the variable row heights in terms of the view from that of the variable row heights in terms of the model.

      • restoreSelection

        Restores the selection from that in terms of the model.
